ch.unige.ng.problems.mirror
Class MirrorFitness

java.lang.Object
  ch.unige.ng.problems.mirror.MirrorFitness
All Implemented Interfaces:
Fitness<java.lang.Boolean>
public class MirrorFitness
extends java.lang.Object
implements Fitness<java.lang.Boolean>

A new fitness that works like a mirror. This is a fitness that is very bad with basicPointCrossover. The number of minimas is equal to 2**(floor(n/2))

Version:
5 mai 2005
Author:
Fontignie Jacques
